text.div:
Care Connect Medication Capability Statement

Minimal conformance requirements for a Medication API. This would typically be found on Prescribing and Dispensing systems

ModeSERVER
Description
Transaction
System History
System Search
Resource TypeProfileReadSearchUpdateCreate
Immunizationhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Immunizationyy
Medicationhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Medicationyy
MedicationAdministrationhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-MedicationAdministrationyy
MedicationDispensehttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-MedicationDispenseyy
MedicationRequesthttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-MedicationRequestyy
MedicationStatementhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-MedicationStatementyy

name: Care Connect Medication Capability Statement
description: Minimal conformance requirements for a Medication API. This would typically be found on Prescribing and Dispensing systems

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Vaccination  (non)-Administration Date

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Business identifier

searchParam.name: notgiven
searchParam.documentation: Administrations which were not given

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient for the vaccination record

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Immunization event status

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Codes that identify this medication

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication code

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations with this external identifier

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication resource

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list administrations  for

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses of this medicine code

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses with this external identifier

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses of this medicine resource

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list dispenses  for

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses with a specified dispense status

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: authoredon
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions written on this date

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions of this medication code

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions with this external identifier

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions of this medication reference

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Returns prescriptions for a specific patient

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Status of the prescription

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: effective
searchParam.documentation: Date when patient was taking (or not taking) the medication

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return statements with this external identifier

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Returns statements for a specific patient.

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Return statements that match the given status
